name: DC Wonder: Unlimited
description: This is a 1v1, 2D fighting game featuring the members of the DC Wonder pop band. Play with friends or take on the 8-stage tournament to unlock new characters and stages.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000 Processor: Pentium III 400MHz, 128 MB RAM Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with 32 MB Video RAM DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 701 MB available space Additional Notes: Compatible with 4-button controller
